message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $11000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I have to consider my own value for the product. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $10200. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I understand your desire to save money, Bob, but I'm getting closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to offer you the product for $10500. This is my final compromise, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.

I understand that you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, Alice, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9700 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I get a decent return on my investment. I'm offering you the product for $10000. This is my final compromise, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
